info.title: Pure FlashArray API
info.description:
# Introduction
Pure FlashArray API

# Overview
Use an API-Token to start a session, that returns an session cookie which expires in 30 minutes by default.

# Authentication
What is the preferred way of using the API?

# Error Codes
Use HTTP Response codes to determine command results.  Error message json formats can be different depending on the API Call.
